java/liquibase/database/sql/ReindexStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.SQLiteDatabase;
00005 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00006 
00007 public class ReindexStatement implements SqlStatement {
00008 
00009         private String schemaName;
00010     private String tableName;
00011     
00012         public ReindexStatement(String schemaName, String tableName) {
00013                 this.schemaName = schemaName;
00014         this.tableName = tableName;
00015         }
00016         
00017         public String getSchemaName() {
00018         return schemaName;
00019     }
00020 
00021     public String getTableName() {
00022         return tableName;
00023     }
00024 
00025         public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00026                 return ";";
00027         }
00028 
00029         public String getSqlStatement(Database database)
00030                         throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00031                 if (!supportsDatabase(database)) {
00032                         throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException(this, database);
00033                 }
00034                 return "REINDEX "+database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName());
00035         }
00036 
00037         public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00038                 return (database instanceof SQLiteDatabase);
00039         }
00040 
00041 }
